page.title: 03POST OFFICES, NEWTON MEARNS
page.content: There are two sorting offices which serve this area, one at Mearns Cross Shopping Centre and the other at Mearnskirk. During weekdays 53 collections are made from the post boxes and these vary from two to six per day. 3 sorters working manually handle about 1100 letters daily. Parcels are not collected so if anyone wants to send a parcel it has to be taken to one of the three post offices. There are two or three parcel deliveries each day. 25 postal workers are employed and staff turnover is about 6 annually. Extra staff are recruited if the workforce falls below 25 and at busy times e.g. Christmas.
